descriptions: Added auto-detection system for Target scripts (ox_target, qtarget, qb-target) in Config
Added Config.UseRPName option to toggle between Roleplay Names and Steam Names in lobby/invites
Added automatic cleanup of all entities (peds, vehicles, props, blips, zones) on resource restart/stop
Implemented Character Names (Firstname Lastname) display support for ESX, QBCore, and QBox
Fixed critical bug with qb-target interactions where valid targets were not clickable (collision issue)
Fixed issue where the menu header displayed Steam Name instead of RP Name (race condition fix)
Fixed config logic where useE fallback was not checking resource state correctly
